mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spring_users (userid, name, password, exp, level, img) VALUES ( #{userid}, #{name}, PASSWORD(#{password}), 0, 1, #{img})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM spring_users WHERE userid = #{userid} AND password = PASSWORD(#{password})
mapper.update: UPDATE spring_users SET exp=#{exp},level=#{level} WHERE userid = #{userid}
mapper.select: SELECT if(a.exp >= b.exp, 1, 0) FROM spring_users a, spring_exp b WHERE a.level = b.level AND a.level = #{level} AND a.userid = #{userid}
